name: Unplugged (itch) (upperC)
description:
Windows/Mac build recommendend over web build!
(These look quite a bit nicer)

You're a robot trying to traverse through levels filled with unfriendly machines. Your incredible combat capabilities are limited only by your clunky power source. You have to carry your battery around the level with you, if you stray too far from it things might get dangerous...

Glitch shader by arlez80

Code, Art, Sound by upperC (me)
